content: The 1997 film Titanic was directed by which acclaimed filmmaker known for his work on other blockbusters like Avatar and Terminator?

The 1997 film Titanic was directed by James Cameron, who is indeed an acclaimed filmmaker known for his work on other blockbuster films such as Avatar and the Terminator series. Cameron is renowned for his innovative filmmaking techniques and his ability to create visually stunning and emotionally resonant stories. His direction in Titanic helped make it one of the highest-grossing films of all time and earned him numerous awards, including multiple Oscars. His subsequent film, Avatar, also broke box office records and pushed the boundaries of visual effects in cinema.
